script.code:
/* Report wrapper for reading configurations * * * HTTP post parameters: * configuration {string}: Optional name of the configuration to be read - returns all configurations when not specified. * * Examples: * webMI.data.call("ReportReadConfiguration", {}, function(e) {}) * webMI.data.call("ReportReadConfiguration", {configuration: "myOptionalFolder.MyConfigurationDemo"}, function(e) {}) * */
var name = request.postvalues["configuration"] ? request.postvalues["configuration"] : ""; return call("Report.ConfigurationHandler", {action: "read", configuration: name});
